liveEvents.description: Smart India Hackathon is Indiaâ€™s largest innovation challenge where students collaborate to solve real-world problems using cutting-edge technologies. Participants submit innovative ideas and working prototypes to compete at a national level.

ideas.title: AI Traffic Congestion Predictor
ideas.description: This project leverages machine learning models trained on historical traffic data and real-time sensor inputs to predict congestion hotspots. Authorities can dynamically adjust traffic signals and reduce urban congestion.

ideas.title: Smart Waste Segregation System
ideas.description: An IoT-based smart bin system that uses sensors and computer vision to automatically segregate waste into wet and dry categories, improving recycling efficiency.

ideas.title: Mental Health Support Chatbot
ideas.description: A conversational AI chatbot that provides early mental health support to students by analyzing sentiment and stress indicators from conversations.

liveEvents.title: National Innovation Challenge 2025
liveEvents.description: The National Innovation Challenge encourages students to design scalable technology solutions that address pressing societal and industrial challenges.

ideas.title: AI Resume Screening Platform
ideas.description: An AI-powered resume screening system that helps recruiters shortlist candidates by analyzing skills, experience, and role compatibility.

ideas.title: Smart Finance Tracker
ideas.description: A full-stack web application that helps users track expenses, generate reports, and get AI-driven financial insights.
